cu.explanation_en: Setting ciphering_algorithms[0] to an invalid enum value 'nea5' will cause security negotiation failure and connection establishment issues.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to 16 exceeds the valid range (typically 1-8) and will cause MIMO configuration errors leading to transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為 16 超過有效範圍（通常為 1-8），會導致 MIMO 配置錯誤並造成傳輸失敗。
